snippet: The Romney camp is playing the expectations game by predicting a good performance by Rick Santorum in the New Hampshire primary.
abstract: The Romney camp is playing the expectations game by predicting a good performance by Rick Santorum in the New Hampshire primary.
lead_paragraph: SALEM, N.H. - A senior campaign adviser to Mitt Romney in New Hampshire predicted that Rick Santorum would perform "very well" in the state's Republican primary on Tuesday.

headline.main: Romney Aide Expects Strong Santorum Showing in New Hampshire
